items.title: Russian attacks on Ukraine double since Trump inauguration
items.description: Missile and drone attacks on Ukraine are now at their highest, despite Trump's promise to end the war.

items.title: Oceangate's Titan whistleblower: 'People were sold a lie'
items.description: A former Oceangate employee says he told US authorities about safety concerns with the sub before it imploded.

items.title: UN official says Israel expanding Gaza operations would risk 'catastrophic consequences'
items.description: The UN's assistant secretary general says reports of the possible move are "deeply alarming".

items.title: Texas governor seeks court order to fire top Democrat who fled in row over voting map
items.description: "There must be consequences," says the governor as Democrats insist they will not return to Texas.

items.title: Clintons subpoenaed to testify in congressional Epstein investigation
items.description: Former top officials from the justice department during the Obama, Trump and Biden administrations were also sent subpoenas.
